body.p:
To his Excellency Thos. E. Bramlette
Governor of the State of Ky

We the undersigned loyal citizens of the State of Ky and county of Calloway do hereby represent that one David, McGahn, is indicted as charged in indictment herewith enclosed and is now running at Large and an attempt has been made to arrest him, and he now threatens any and all persons whether officers or not who Shall attempt his arrest now we pray your Excellency to authorize the Sheriff of this county also one constable S. A. Miller to follow the Said David McGahn and arrest him wherever he may be found Either in or out of the State, and that you inform by Proclamation or otherwise the Govenors of Tennessee & Illinois that Such a Person is within there limits, and we want, his delivery over to the civil, authorities of this State to be dealt with according to Law

W M Stoops
Wm. P. Guthrie
Gilbert, Harding
N. H. Ryan
Joseph Miller
W H. Daely
J. E. Miller County Attorney
John, S, Wilcox
E. C. Starkes
J. B. England Clk C. C. C
Jas Jones
S McKnight

Requisition on Governor of Tennessee for David McGaha Grand Larceny & apptd. L. A Miller agent
24 Oct/65

The object of this petition is that the Governor of Kentucky demand the surrender of the refugee McGahn from the Governor of Tennessee and that L. A. Miller be appointed to arrest and receive him from the authorities of Tennessee, where the accused has taken refuge,
